posts.title: Glitter Beard Kit
posts.content: Transform your dull facial hair into a shiny and shimmering mane using this glitter bead kit. The kit includes an all natural serum that won’t harm your beard, golden glitter, and a handy bib that’ll keep your body clean as you’re applying the glitter.

posts.title: Water Rocket Launcher Kit
posts.content: Instantly transform any 2 liter plastic bottle into a speeding rocket using this water rocket launcher kit. Crafted from aluminum, stainless steel, brass, and durable plastic, this easy to operate kit is capable of launching a 2 liter bottle of soda over 350 feet in the sky.

posts.title: Snow Globe Shakers
posts.content: Spice up your meals by sprinkling  some extra flavor with the snow globe shakers. These festive shakers are modeled like small snow globes you get to fill with salt and pepper and contain a cuddly polar bear  to keep you company throughout your meal.

posts.title: Temperature Reflective Shower Head
posts.content: Ensure the water is at just the right temperature by outfitting your bathroom with this temperature reflective shower head. It features five settings – including a water-saving economy mode – and comes with LEDs that light up depending on the water temperature.

posts.title: Compact Folding Travel Iron
posts.content: Keep your outfit looking clean and crisp while on the road by using this compact folding travel iron. This handy appliance comes with six heat settings and features a versatile design that allows you to easily iron collars and cuffs as well as flat surfaces.

posts.title: Doctor Who Sonic Screwdriver
posts.content: Be just like the Doctor when you get your hands on this Sonic Screwdriver. This novelty collector’s item replicates the eleventh model of the iconic screwdriver and features a fully functional button you press to activate the LED lit tip accompanied by realistic sounds.

posts.title: Baby Up In This Bitch Car Decal
posts.content: Make people take notice of your precious cargo by getting their attention with the “Baby Up In This Bitch” car decal. It’s styled like the popular “Baby On Board” signs but with a more impactful and humorous statement that’s sure to get a big reaction from drivers.

posts.title: I Before E Mug
posts.content: English is a strange and beautiful language. Celebrate and contemplate this wonderful language of ours during your morning cup of Joe with this “I before E” mug. This 11 ounce ceramic mug makes the perfect gift for the grammar stickler in your life.

posts.title: Amphibious R/C Car
posts.content: Show your kids that it’s fun to conquer mother nature with the amphibious remote control car. Unlike your standard remote control car, this amphibious model comes specially designed to be able to trudge through either pavement, sand, dirt, or water.

posts.title: Airmega Smart Air Purifier
posts.content: Live cleaner by improving the air quality in your humble abode with the Airmega smart air purifier. This Apple and Android compatible appliance comes with a small sensor that informs you of the air quality in real time and can cover an area of up 1,256 sq. Ft.

posts.title: Wine Glasses For Big Noses
posts.content: Thanks to the innovative design of the wine glass for big noses, you’ll finally be able to fit that giant schnoz of yours into the wine glass for once. The unique stemware features a hand forged notch rim to facilitate drinking and enhance the wine smelling experience.

posts.title: Camera Lens Coffee Mug
posts.content: This high quality and super detailed camera lens is actually a coffee mug you can drink out of! The camera lens coffee mug is a great gift for photography enthusiasts, and will surely turn many heads when people see you drinking out of it.
